newsArray.title: Champions Trophy 2025: Who Will Perform At CT 2025 Opening Ceremony In Pakistan?
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Performers in Champions Trophy 2025 opening ceremony: ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is set to begin on February 19, with Pakistan hosting the tournament. Meanwhile, Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has made a mega announcement regarding the grand opening ceremony.Lahore's Gaddafi Stadium, which will host the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 tournament's first match between Pakistan and New Zealand, is set to feature an exciting lineup of performances by renowned Pakistani artists.Spectacular Opening Ceremony in LahorePakistan Cricket Board (PCB) President Mohsin Naqvi has confirmed that celebrated Pakistani singers Ali Zafar, Aima Baig, and Arif Lohar will perform at the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 opening ceremony, scheduled to begin at 7 PM.Gaddafi Stadium will also host four Champions Trophy matches, including a high-profile clash between England and Australia on February 22 and a semi-final on March 5.Tomorrow at 7 pm InshAllaha pic.twitter.com/QmqgRKQtc8‚Äî Mohsin Naqvi (@MohsinnaqviC42) February 6, 2025Karachi to host additional Opening CeremonyIn addition to Lahore, Karachi's National Stadium will also host an opening ceremony on February 11. Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has highlighted major upgrades at Gaddafi Stadium, including improved floodlights, increased seating capacity, and a state-of-the-art electronic scoreboard.Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Chairman Mohsin Naqvi praised the efforts of those involved in preparing the venue despite challenges. The Karachi opening ceremony will take place in the presence of Pakistan's President, Asif Ali Zardari.Ali Zafar is set to perform at the GSL opening ceremony, bringing his signature energy to the event. üé§üé∂ pic.twitter.com/sqbdPB3AtS‚Äî PakPassion.net (@PakPassion) February 6, 2025#WATCH: Pakistan‚Äôs newly renovated Gaddafi Stadium set to host a free opening ceremony on Feb. 7 in Lahore featuring fireworks display and live performances ahead of the Champions Trophy 2025, the country‚Äôs cricket board announces https://t.co/hKzNnRJ65H pic.twitter.com/CTUVaGj02F‚Äî Arab News Pakistan (@arabnewspk) February 6, 2025Pakistan Squad for ICC Champions Trophy 2025: Mohammad Rizwan (captain), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Salman Ali Agha, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, and Shaheen Shah Afridi.

newsArray.title: Blessing Muzarabani Becomes First Zimbabwe Pacer To Pick Seven Wickets in an Innings, Achieves Record During IRE vs ZIM One-Off Test 2025
newsArray.description: Blessing Muzarabani is having a historic outing in the ongoing IRE vs ZIM One-Off Test 2025, by becoming the first Zimbabwe pacer to pick seven wickets in an innings. This is also Muzarabani's second five-wicket haul in Tests, having made debut in 2017.

newsArray.title: What Did 'Rohit Bhaiya' Tell Harshit Rana After An Expensive Opening Spell? Debutant Pacer Reveals
creator: Megha Mallick
newsArray.description: While India pacer Harshit Rana got punished during a 26-run over, rather an assault from Phil Salt, he ended up picking the important wickets of Ben Duckett, Harry Brook and Liam Livingstone, finishing with figures of 3/53 in seven overs of debut as England were bowled out for 248.
